Title: Relates to physical needs assessments for public housing authorities
Summary: Requires a public housing authority to file in the office of the commissioner of housing and community renewal and with the temporary president of the senate and the speaker of the assembly a physical needs assessment every five years; defines "physical needs assessment".
LawCode: Amd ยง37, Pub Hous L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public housing law, in relation to physical needs assessments for public housing authorities
